thread.title: D’OH! Trump-tormented Debra Messing reminded of constitutional duties after self-administered oath
thread.title_full: D’OH! Trump-tormented Debra Messing reminded of constitutional duties after self-administered oath

author: Doug P.
title: D’OH! Trump-tormented Debra Messing reminded of constitutional duties after self-administered oath
text:
D’OH! Trump-tormented Debra Messing reminded of constitutional duties after self-administered oath Posted at 10:44 pm on January 20, 2017 by Doug P. People are actually doing this? 
Is this real life? https://t.co/7fbL7U4Jy8 
— Chris (@mightbecrg) January 21, 2017 
Actress Debra Messing has joined some fellow liberals when it comes to getting super-serious about the U.S. Constitution: Today I joined millions of Americans in taking an Oath to protect, preserve and defend the constitution. Join me. Learn more at TheOath.US pic.twitter.com/rcqMtUlpRa 
— Debra Messing (@DebraMessing) January 20, 2017 
Does she know what she’s getting herself into? For starters… @DebraMessing What's the second item within the Bill of Rights? 
— Charles C. W. Cooke (@charlescwcooke) January 21, 2017 @DebraMessing so that means you're pro 2nd Amendment? 
— SHIREEN QUDOSI (@ShireenQudosi) January 21, 2017 Wondering if that includes the 'Right To Keep and Bear Arms'? #2A #MAGA #Inauguration https://t.co/mKvGsTMpCk 
At least progress is being made! But wait, there’s more prog backfire: OK…So you agree with the 2nd admen, and the electoral college? https://t.co/tvx32NUZRk
